trans-unit.source: DEEP as a Service API (DEEPaaS API) is a REST API built on aiohttp that allows to provide easy access to machine learning, deep learning and artificial intelligence models. By using the DEEPaaS API users can easily run a REST API in front of their model, thus accessing its functionality via HTTP calls. DEEPaaS API leverages the OpenAPI specification.
trans-unit.target: DEEP即服务API（DEEPaaS API）是基于aiohttp构建的REST API ，可轻松访问机器学习，深度学习和人工智能模型。通过使用DEEPaaS API，用户可以轻松地在其模型之前运行REST API，从而通过HTTP调用访问其功​​能。DEEPaaS API利用了OpenAPI规范。

trans-unit.source: DEEPaaS is a REST API to expose a machine learning model.
trans-unit.target: DEEPaaS是一个REST API,用于暴露机器学习模型。

trans-unit.source: If you are using this software and want to cite it in any work, please use the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用本软件,并想在任何作品中引用,请使用以下方式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run the code in develop mode (i.e. pip install -e), you can issue the following command before:
trans-unit.target: 如果要在开发模式下运行代码（即 pip install -e ），则可以在发出以下命令之前：

trans-unit.source: Lopez Garcia, A. "DEEPaaS API: a REST API for Machine Learning and Deep Learning models". In: Journal of Open Source Software 4(42) (2019), pp. 1517. ISSN: 2475-9066. DOI: 10.21105/joss.01517
trans-unit.target: Lopez Garcia，A。“ DEEPaaS API：用于机器学习和深度学习模型的REST API”。于：Journal of Open Source Software 4（42）（2019），第1517页.ISSN：2475-9066。DOI：10.21105 / joss.01517

trans-unit.source: The DEEPaaS documentation is hosted on Read the Docs.
The best way to quickly try the DEEPaaS API is through:
trans-unit.target: 快速尝试DEEPaaS API的最好方法是通过。

trans-unit.source: This command will install a virtualenv (in the virtualenv directory) with DEEPaaS and all its dependencies and will run the DEEPaaS REST API, listening on 127.0.0.1:5000. If you browse to http://127.0.0.1:5000 you will get the Swagger documentation page (i.e. the Swagger web UI).
trans-unit.target: 此命令将安装带有DEEPaaS及其所有依赖项的virtualenv（位于 virtualenv 目录中），并将运行DEEPaaS REST API，侦听 127.0.0.1:5000 。如果浏览到 http://127.0.0.1:5000 ，则将获得Swagger文档页面（即Swagger Web UI）。

trans-unit.source: This software has been developed within the DEEP-Hybrid-DataCloud (Designing and Enabling E-infrastructures for intensive Processing in a Hybrid DataCloud) project that has received funding from the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement No 777435.
trans-unit.target: 该软件是在DEEP-Hybrid-DataCloud(在混合数据云中进行密集处理的设计和启用电子基础设施)项目中开发的,该项目得到了欧盟地平线2020研究和创新计划的资助,资助协议号为777435。
